tags.name: wb-part
tags.description: WB Part - Reusable HTML template. First boolean attribute specifies the part name.

attributes.name: card-tile
attributes.description: Use the "card-tile" part template. Draggable component tile for sidebar/palette

attributes.name: alert-box
attributes.description: Use the "alert-box" part template. Alert/notification message box

attributes.name: stat-tile
attributes.description: Use the "stat-tile" part template. Statistics display tile with trend indicator

attributes.name: nav-link
attributes.description: Use the "nav-link" part template. Navigation link item

attributes.name: user-avatar
attributes.description: Use the "user-avatar" part template. User avatar with optional status indicator

attributes.name: price-tag
attributes.description: Use the "price-tag" part template. Price display with optional original price

attributes.name: feature-item
attributes.description: Use the "feature-item" part template. Feature list item with icon

attributes.name: button-primary
attributes.description: Use the "button-primary" part template. Primary action button

attributes.name: icon-button
attributes.description: Use the "icon-button" part template. Icon-only button

attributes.name: badge
attributes.description: Use the "badge" part template. Small badge/tag label

attributes.name: empty-state
attributes.description: Use the "empty-state" part template. Empty state placeholder with optional action

attributes.name: loading-skeleton
attributes.description: Use the "loading-skeleton" part template. Loading placeholder skeleton

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: URL to fetch JSON data for the part

attributes.name: refresh
attributes.description: Auto-refresh interval in milliseconds (requires src)

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: [card-tile] Emoji or icon for the tile (string) [required] | [stat-tile] Icon emoji | [nav-link] Icon emoji | [button-primary] Icon before label | [icon-button] Button icon [required] | [empty-state] Large icon [default: ðŸ“­]

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: [card-tile] Display label for the tile (string) [required] | [stat-tile] Label describing the statistic [required] | [nav-link] Link text [required] | [button-primary] Button text [required] | [badge] Badge text [required]

attributes.name: behavior
attributes.description: [card-tile] Behavior ID to apply when dropped (string)

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: [card-tile] Custom element tag name (string)

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: [alert-box] Alert style variant | [button-primary] Button style variant | [icon-button] Button style | [badge] Badge style | [loading-skeleton] Skeleton type

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: [alert-box] Alert heading text (string) | [empty-state] Empty state heading [required]

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: [alert-box] Alert message content (string) [required] | [empty-state] Additional message text

attributes.name: dismissible
attributes.description: [alert-box] Show dismiss button (boolean)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: [stat-tile] Main statistic value (e.g., '1,234') (string) [required]

attributes.name: trend
attributes.description: [stat-tile] Trend direction

attributes.name: trend-value
attributes.description: [stat-tile] Trend amount (e.g., '+12%') (string)

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: [nav-link] Link URL (string) [required]

attributes.name: badge
attributes.description: [nav-link] Badge text (e.g., notification count) (string)

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: [nav-link] Mark as active/current (boolean)

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: [user-avatar] User's name (for alt text) (string) [required]

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: [user-avatar] Initials to show if no image (string)

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: [user-avatar] Avatar size | [button-primary] Button size | [icon-button] Button size

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: [user-avatar] Online status indicator

attributes.name: price
attributes.description: [price-tag] Current price (e.g., '$29') (string) [required]

attributes.name: original
attributes.description: [price-tag] Original price (for discounts) (string)

attributes.name: period
attributes.description: [price-tag] Billing period (e.g., '/mo', '/year') (string)

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: [feature-item] Feature text (string) [required]

attributes.name: included
attributes.description: [feature-item] Whether feature is included (boolean) [default: true]

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: [button-primary] Disable the button | [icon-button] Disable the button (boolean)

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description: [icon-button] Tooltip/aria-label text (string) [required]

attributes.name: action-label
attributes.description: [empty-state] Action button label (enables body slot) (string)

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: [loading-skeleton] Width (CSS value) (string) [default: 100%]

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: [loading-skeleton] Height (CSS value) (string)
